PEPPY_ALSA_PIPE_CONF_UPDATE_ERR: an error occurred while updating "{}". Check logs for details.
PEPPY_ALSA_PIPE_BYPASS_TIP: {} Peppy Bypass creates a separate audio pipeline that does not incorporate the Peppy ALSA plugin. Set '{}' as the output device for players that do not work nicely with Peppy ALSA.
PEPPY_ALSA_PIPE_PEPPY_ONLY_TIP: {} Peppy Only: audio sent to '{}' will be processed only by the Peppy ALSA plugin.
PEPPY_ALSA_PIPE_MPD_CONF_BYPASS: modified with Peppy Bypass (separate audio outputs to '{}' and '{}').
PEPPY_ALSA_PIPE_MPD_CONF_MODIFY_DESC:
Modify with Peppy Bypass:

MPD will be configured to send audio to two outputs - one that bypasses Peppy ALSA (for actual playback); the other just for Peppy ALSA (for provision of VU meter / spectrum data). Select this option for maximum compatibility with different audio formats (native DSD, in particular).



Do not modify:

No changes will be made to MPD configuration
